info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 30 at 3:47AM MDT until July 30 at 4:30AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM MDT FOR EASTERN DANIELS...NORTH CENTRAL ROOSEVELT AND WESTERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 346 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whitetail to near Bredette, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Flaxville, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Archer, Port Of Whitetail, Whitetail, Madoc, Outlook, Daleview and Navajo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
